metas.name: Dead Dead Demon's Dededededestruction
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Drama, Sci-Fi, Slice of Life Tags:Seinen/Female Protagonist/Politics/Military/Dystopian/Coming of Age/Philosophy/Aliens/Language Barrier/Primarily Female Cast/Surreal Comedy/School The Japan Self-Defense Forces are still looking for a way to combat the alien threat, but so far conventional weapons have had no effect. Maybe it’s time to try something unconventional.

Meanwhile, Kadode Koyama and her best friend avidly track the aliens’ movements on social media and less enthusiastically study for college entrance exams. When the end of the world looms overhead, you learn to take things one step at a time.

(Source: Viz Media)
